title: Petition to remove Ezreal from public serves until 2199.
body: Ezreal serves as staple champion for those who do not understand the role of an adc in the game of league. He is the go-to champion for those who do not play bot and thus leads to the most cancerous gameplay imaginable for other players.

replies.body: Fizz is more cancerous than Ezreal will ever be.
Seriously what's your beef with Ezreal?
I would like for everyone to stop referring to champions as cancerous, as my mother has had cancer in the past, and it's nothing to take lightly.

There are multiple meanings to the word cancer. It's not just an umbrella term used to describe many diseases.

Also, you're name is "die bomber". So I really can't take any statements you make about being offended seriously.
Die is German for the word "The". My name translating to "The Bomber".
i hate how ezreal abuses iceborn gauntlet

I don't know if this is a troll thread or a serious claim. Assuming it's the latter, Ezreal is not cancerous and he's certainly not easy to play. He's a safe pick because he can play much more passively in lane than other carries while stacking up for his mid-late game spike. 

 Saying Ezreal is "serves as a staple champion for those who do not understand the role of an adc in the game of league" is quite wrong. A good adc must be able to kite, cs well, and have perfect positioning in a teamfight, particularly knowing when to kite backwards, or go on the offensive. Ezreal requires all of these attributes. 

 As for you saying it leads to the most cancerous imaginable, if you don't mind, a bit more explanation would be helpful please and thank you.

theres a disco heat video, of a player calling for champions to be removed from the game.

that player wasn't very good, and quite the rager.
If Ezreal leaves then as a Taric main I will follow!
Yeah, all Ezreal does is output moderate to high damage from mid to long range, kite for an eternity (maybe 2), and bait the enemy team almost as well as Teemo.  He is totally useless.
